project.projectList: SELECT A.*, B.group_name FROM project A LEFT JOIN user_group B on A.user_group=B.seq $$WHERE$$
project.regProject: INSERT INTO project (project_name, project_bg, font_size, font_color, project_desc, start_date, end_date, image, user_group, deleteYN, regdate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, now())
project.modProject: UPDATE project SET project_name = ?, project_bg = ?, font_size = ?, font_color = ?, project_desc = ?, start_date = ?, end_date = ?, image = ?, user_group = ? WHERE seq = ?
project.delProject: UPDATE project SET deleteYN = 1 WHERE seq = ?
project.projectActivityList: SELECT * FROM project_activity WHERE project_seq =? ORDER BY seq ASC
project.regActivity: INSERT INTO project_activity (activity, project_seq, activity_image) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
project.projectWordList: SELECT * FROM project_word WHERE project_seq =? ORDER BY seq ASC
project.projectActivityWordList: SELECT * FROM project_activity_word WHERE project_seq =? ORDER BY seq ASC
project.projectActivityWordFrontList: SELECT * FROM project_activity_word WHERE project_seq =? and checked_activity=? ORDER BY seq ASC
project.regActivityWord: INSERT INTO project_activity_word (checked_activity, checked_word, activity, word, project_seq) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
project.regProjectProperties: INSERT INTO project_properties (project_seq, property01, property02, property03, property04, property05, property06, property07, property08, property09, property10, regdate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, now())
project.modProjectProperties: UPDATE project_properties SET property01 = ?, property02 = ?, property03 = ?, property04 = ?, property05 = ?, property06 = ?, property07 = ?, property08 = ?, property09 = ?, property10 = ? WHERE project_seq = ?
